properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mandalo cherani gorrelenno kotlakoladiga kalavu ila Atmalakorakai vedanatho Vedakedamu rammu O sanghamaa Mandalo cherani gorrelenno Rammane Yesu prardinchumu nadipinchunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prakatinchani stalamulu kalavu Nannu chatinchuvaru kalarichata Piluvabadina varandarunu Mana prabhu yaajnaku lobadi randi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
